title: To advise whether to allow commercial / office user of any listed building of Heritage Precincts and when to terminate the same
clause_text: To advise whether to allow commercial / office user of any listed building of Heritage Precincts and when to terminate the same. To advise on erection of outside advertisement / bill boards.
